infobox-image: Christian Cook, Jesse Hubard, Trevor Tierney and Keith Elias.jpg
MLL teams: New Jersey Pride (2001-2004) | Baltimore Bayhawks (2004-2006) | Washington Bayhawks (2007-2008)

Career highlights: College highlights | Schmeisser Award (1998) | Men's Ivy League Player of the Year (1994) | All-American 2x (1st team: 1998; 3rd team: 1997) | NCAA Men's Lacrosse Championship (1996, 1997 & 1998) | Professional highlights | Major League Lacrosse Steinfeld Cup Champion (2005) | Major League Lacrosse All-Star 2x

World Lacrosse Championship: Silver medal - second place | 2006 London (Ontario) | Field lacrosse
